ygData.msgSnippet: ... Whoa!! he exclaimed as Battera sped past him. He knew that he couldnt match her speed, but he wasnt one to give up the chase. He continued after her,

::WindRider::
"Whoa!!" he exclaimed as Battera sped past him. He
knew that he couldnt match her speed, but he wasnt one
to give up the chase. He continued after her, laughing
the whole way.
--- logomorph@... wrote:
> ::Battera:: 
> 
> She came right up behind him.  She manuovered and
> flew under him.  
> She paced her wings to match his while flying.  The
> halls weren't the 
> biggest and didn't give her much room in bat mode. 
> She flew under 
> and past him.  She moved so she was now right in
> front of him.  She 
> laughed. "I'm going to get there first." She sped
> off ahead of him 
> towards the entrance.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow
> <twb176@y...> wrote:
> > ::WindRider::
> > WindRider sensed Battera come up behind him. He
> > laughed, "Think you're pretty fast, huh?" He
> sensed
> > something about her, a certain gentleness deep
> within
> > her spark. It definitely had him interested. He
> sped
> > up and flew towards the entrance.
> 
> 
>
